ISSUE.TITLE: Require space between save order total and cancel button - admin side order total
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Go to admin side order detail page 2) Click on **Edit order total** button 3) Require space between **save order total** and **cancel** button https://www.loom.com/share/ae9a15148ef94adc836491f301f1f071 It was good in 4.20

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4491 Added space between save order total and cancel button in admin area
